title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Arts-Based Leadership Development—A Window for the Post-Truth Era

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply at least three strategies for enhancing emotional resilience and coping with stress through artistic activities.
Learners can produce at least two creative communication scenarios in educational settings using non-verbal expression techniques (theater, visual arts, etc.).
Learners can reinterpret social issues as artworks and propose at least one empathetic communication strategy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
